an4.258:4.1: “Mendicants, when families don’t stay wealthy for long, it’s always for one or more of these four reasons.
an4.258:4.3: They don’t look for what’s lost; they don’t fix old things; they eat and drink too much; or they put an unethical man or woman in charge.
an4.258:4.4: When families don’t stay wealthy for long, it’s always for one or more of these four reasons.
an4.258:5.1: When families do stay wealthy for long, it’s always for one or more of these four reasons.
an4.258:5.3: They look for what’s lost; they fix old things; they eat and drink in moderation; and they put an ethical man or woman in charge.
an4.258:5.4: When families do stay wealthy for long, it’s always for one or more of these four reasons.”
